name: Bullet Arena (masnsen)
description:
Bullet Arena is an online 2D shooter with base-building elements.

Fight online in deathmatch or in team-based gamemodes. Build your base using various materials such as wood, stone, or metal - kill as many enemies as you can and fulfill your objectives to earn as much bux as possible and win the match !

Using your bux, you can buy various items, structures and devices to help you gain an advantage against your foes, such as firearms, sentries, power generators, a cloaking device, and more.

There are currently 4 playable maps:

  • Everest
  • Forest
  • Caves
  • Hell

There are also currently 5 gamemodes:

  • Free for All
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Control Points
  • Capture the Flag
  • Fortress

More content shall be added in future updates, however, as the project is still in an early stage ! We also plan to launch it on Steam, eventually.
